backend/main.mo: Defines core types for restaurants, menu items, orders, and comparison utilities, and integrates storage, authorization, and migration logic in the main actor.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old live orders to a new format by adding location fields and setting last update timestamps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their roles and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes across the UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing routing, authentication, theming, and showing pages like home, cart, orders, and admin.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing restaurant contact info, social links, and branding using fetched restaurant data.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, cart count, authentication controls, admin checks, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/LiveOrdersView.t: Displays and updates live orders for admins, including status changes, new‑order detection, and rendering order details with menu item lookup.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and saving a user's profile with form inputs and a save mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login and clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveLocationSharin: Tracks and uploads the user's live geolocation for an order, handling permissions, errors, and periodic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React‑query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, restaurant data, menu items, cart, orders, and mutations with toast feedback.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes, setting color and layout primitives.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing menu items, orders, and image uploads with various dialogs and actions.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items, manages customer details, and handles order placement.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows restaurant menu with search, filtering, and add‑to‑cart functionality, ensuring required items are included.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists user orders, tracks active orders, and manages live location sharing status.
frontend/src/utils/menuItemImage.ts: Utility functions for validating images, converting to bytes, and creating or revoking preview URLs.
frontend/src/utils/requiredMenuItems.ts: Ensures required menu items are present by merging defaults with fetched items.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session‑stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with dark mode, content paths, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, extended themes, animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and a detailed feature list for the food delivery platform, outlining authentication, actor lifecycle, admin bootstrap, RBAC, and typed frontend API hooks.
